turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to make an order at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order from 9718 Washington Blvd, Culver City, CA 90232

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Caffe Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like skim.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any add ins?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like chocolate and caramel syrup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you would like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, I'd like a shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: To confirm, you would like a grande Caffe Americano with chocolate and caramel syrup and a shot of espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like this order to be placed now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order is complete at 9718 Washington Blvd, Culver City, CA 90232 and will be ready for pick up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds great
